abilities.description: When you hold a ceremony to commemorate the honored dead, roll +heart and add +1. On a hit, take +1 spirit and +1 momentum as you are heartened by their journey to Vahalla. On a miss, envision a new and discouraging truth about this loss and @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.e09e2fc8bb709320]{Endure Stress} (1 stress).

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.aac3783710ad7499]{End the Fight} by attempting to slay a sapient foe, you may reroll any dice. If you do and miss, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.e09e2fc8bb709320]{Endure Stress} (2 stress).

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.92b85c33a17ab487]{Face Death}, you may call upon the goddess Hel's power. If you do and your action die shows a 1, you die as your spirit is violently summoned to Hel. If your action die is 2 or more, you score a weak hit.
